titles.title: To amend section 3554(a)(4) of title 44, United States Code, to direct the head of each agency to ensure Federal employees are trained in cyber security, and for other purposes.
Internet of Things Cyber Security Training for Federal Employees Act
Internet of Things Cyber Security Training for Federal Employees Act
Internet of Things Cyber Security Training for Federal Employees Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.
